**Biography**

Hailey Rousey is a first year graduate student in Psychology at the University of California, Riverside. Prior she earned a AA-T in Psychology from Fresno City College (2018) and a BA in Psychology from California State University, Fresno (2022). She is interested in researching infant motor, perception, and cognitive development.
